p: Insect cell-derived NVCP VLPs were initially tested in two Phase I trials [ 144, 147]. In the first trial, 20 antibody-positive adult volunteers were given two oral doses (days 1 and 21) of 100 or 250 μg of VLPs formulated in water without adjuvant. It was observed that serum IgG responses were dose dependent and 100 % of vaccinated subjects who received 250 μg of VLPs increased their NV specific titers at least four-fold [ 147]. Fifteen out of 18 participants responded in serum IgG titers after the first VLP dose and showed no increase after the second dose [ 147]. Importantly, no side effects were observed in vaccinated volunteers [ 147].
